h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Yellowbrow (Round Two)
content: With enough patience and practice, and dodging his particularly deadly attacks, you'll at last cut Yellowbrow down to size. He'll try to flee the temple back onto the frozen lake at Mirrormere, only to be swallowed up by the Sage's Relic under the lake.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Yellowbrow (Round Two)'.
The content is as follows:
With enough patience and practice, and dodging his particularly deadly attacks, you'll at last cut Yellowbrow down to size. He'll try to flee the temple back onto the frozen lake at Mirrormere, only to be swallowed up by the Sage's Relic under the lake.
